title: minecraft打不开了55555555
author: foot
txt_content:
错误报告：

// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.

Description: Initializing game

replies.author: menghzheng
replies.txt_content: 应该是你的游戏没有购买，你可以购买游戏解决，所以出现这种情况，你可以下懒人包，里面一部分是破解的。

replies.author: shangxuanchen
